Title: ‘Minister’s statement contrary to condition in textile mills’
Content: Tamil Nadu Textile and Common Labour Union on Wednesday strongly condemned the statement made in the Assembly by the Minister for Textiles O. S. Manian that there was no exploitation of women workers
Author: Staff Reporter
Description: Tamil Nadu Textile and Common Labour Union on Wednesday strongly condemned the statement made in the Assembly by the Minister for Textiles O. S. Manian that there was no exploitation of women workers
